links.to_node: My girlfriend may experience emotional distress and feelings of abandonment.
I may feel a sense of relief or guilt following the breakup.
My girlfriend might face financial difficulties without my support.
My girlfriend could struggle with daily life and logistics due to her poor English skills.
My girlfriend may need to find alternative housing if she cannot afford the current rent on her own.
I may experience loneliness or second thoughts after ending the relationship.
My girlfriend might seek support from friends, community groups, or services for immigrants.
My girlfriend could be motivated to become more independent and improve her English skills.
